GSD.description:
KVM: Don't null dereference ops->destroy

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.15 by commit d4a5a79b780891c5cbdfdc6124d46fdf8d13dba1. For more details please see the references link.
